info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 1:22PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Weld County through 215 PM MDT... At 122 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles north of Purcell, or 27 miles southeast of Cheyenne, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grover. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
